data.name: Alchem It
data.detailed_description:
Start your new journey as an alchemist! Open your own potion shop and start brewing all kinds of potions for your dear customers. As a new alchemy apprentice, you will learn about plenty of different ingredients and all the brewing techniques needed to make your customers happy. Work hard and earn coins to upgrade and decorate your shop!

Brew potions


Customers will need different remedies depending on their needs, so be ready to brew all kinds of potions and elixirs. Check the scroll or follow the recipe shown in the magic book to pour the correct ingredients into the cauldron. Once the potion is done, choose the correct bottle size, fill it with the liquid in the cauldron and deliver it to your customer. The faster you go, the more coins you will earn!

Master your tools


Each ingredient requires different tools to be used. Melt the metal to create precious gems in many shapes and forms. Use your garden to grow ingredients (don’t forget to water them!). There is a lot to discover, more tools and ingredients will be unlocked as you advance through the levels in Alchem It.

Customize your store


Earn coins for each potion you sell! With your earnings, you will be able to decorate your shop and buy new optional tools to be more efficient and brew even more potions in less time. You will also be able to customize your hands, decorate your shops with all kinds of objects, and more.

data.short_description: Become an alchemist shopkeeper and serve potions to your customers. Master your tools to gather many ingredients and brew potions as fast as you can. Unlock new tools, levels and decorate your dream alchemy shop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR headset is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 / AMD Ryzen 3600 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR headset is required
